short.en: Provides more hooks to GLPI plugins.

long.en:
To provide more hooks to GLPI plugins using runkit integration. In particular currently providing pre_show_item and post_show_item for Ticket, Computer and Reminder items
Added pre_show_item and post_show_item to TicketFollowup and CommonGLPI. Added show_form_buttons and show_form_header to TicketFollowup.
This plugin is currentlyused by plugin 'lock'. https://github.com/tomolimo/lock
Currently tested with: GLPI 0.83, 0.85 and 0.90 PHP 5.3, 5.4.
Note: needs PHP module 'runkit'.
